Get the residuals for a specific tdmorefit

Source: R/ebe.R, R/model.R
residuals.Rd

Get the residuals for a specific tdmorefit

Get the residual values of a predicted value vs the observed value

# S3 method for tdmorefit
residuals(object, data, weighted = FALSE, ...)

# S3 method for tdmore
residuals(object, predicted, observed, weighted = FALSE,
  inverse = FALSE, ...)

Arguments

object

A TDMore object
data

optional data.frame If specified, this adds the original residuals back onto the data.frame If points at a time without corresponding IRES are present, an IRES of 0 is used and a warning is emitted.
weighted

Should the residuals be divided by the standard deviation of the error model?
...

ignored
predicted

What was predicted, as data.frame
observed

The observed values, as data.frame
inverse

if TRUE, perform the inverse operation (assume `predicted` has IPRED values, and `observed` has IRES/IWRES values)

Value

The `predicted` data.frame, with all output values replaced by IRES or IWRES

Examples

observed <- data.frame(TIME=5, CONC=0.060)
fit <- estimate(tdmore(default_model),
    regimen=data.frame(TIME=0, AMT=10),
    observed=observed,
    covariates=c(WT=70)
    )
wres <- residuals(fit, weighted=TRUE)

all.equal(
  residuals(fit, predict(fit), weighted=TRUE),
  observed
)
#> [1] TRUE

regimen$AMT <- regimen$AMT*2
#> Error in eval(expr, envir, enclos): object 'regimen' not found
predictionForDoubleDose <- residuals(fit, predict(fit, regimen=regimen), weighted=TRUE)
#> Error in predict.tdmorefit(fit, regimen = regimen): object 'regimen' not found
